full_summary:
===============

**PR 12086-6D143-235343 Warehouse and Storage Contract**

**Title:** Warehouse and Storage Contract
**Reference Number:** WS4419898898-Doc4422512124
**Amendment Number:** 2

**Publication Date:** February 12, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** February 29, 2024 - 02:00 p.m. (EST)
**Amendment Date:** March 11, 2024
**Expected Contract Start Date:** January 29, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** January 28, 2029

**Government Procurement Information**
---------------------------------

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity and End User**
----------------------------------

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person:** Mary Paradis (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** mary.paradis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18670701?extsite=MTg2NzA3MDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18670701?extsite=MTg2NzA3MDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Project Description**
-----------------------

Request for Proposal: Specialized Warehousing and Storage Services. The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) requires a comprehensive warehouse and storage solution to ensure the secure and efficient management of its supplies and assets. This contract is expected to commence on January 29, 2024, and may continue until January 28, 2029, or until the requirements are fulfilled.

**Key Details:**
- Delivery region: Canada
- Tender filing format: Competitive Selective Tendering
- Expected contract duration: Up to 5 years

Please observe the tender closing date to submit your proposal. Failure to do so will result in the proposal being excluded from the evaluation process.

I put blank lines between sections to make things easier to read.
